trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up window that has content.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含內容的快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> has one content property: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型**:<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>具有一個內容屬性： <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can have a maximum of one child, which can be any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一個子系，可以是任何最多可以有<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control that has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as its parent.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>做為其父系。

trans-unit.source: ![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Popup 圖例](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup 圖例")

trans-unit.source: You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定放置在快顯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>會顯示在畫面上，它不會不重新定位本身如果其父代重新調整位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> displays its content in its own window on the screen.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>自己的視窗在螢幕上顯示其內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control supports animation when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項支援動畫時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>屬性設定為`true`和應用程式以完全信任執行。

trans-unit.source: An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 以完全信任執行的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在使用者的系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>, you must set the effects directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的內容上的點陣圖和不透明度效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>，您必須直接在設定的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容。

trans-unit.source: The content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> does not inherit effects that are set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control or on any other element that is in the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>不是繼承設定的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制，或是屬於父視窗中的任何其他項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is sized to its content by default.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>預設大小為其內容。

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, applying a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> or bitmap effects may cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to be obscured.
trans-unit.target: 當發生這種情況，套用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A>或點陣圖效果可能會造成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>至會變模糊。

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為內容的預設大小不會提供足夠的顯示效果的區域。

trans-unit.source: If more space is required, you can define a margin around the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content to increase the area that is available to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更多空間，您可以定義周圍的邊界<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容增加控制項可用的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property must be set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A>屬性必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>時用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立工具提示，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ToolTip 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control can contain transparent content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項是否可以包含透明內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control can contain transparent content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項可以包含透明內容，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>以完全信任的應用程式執行時，控制項只可以包含透明的內容。

trans-unit.source: An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 以完全信任執行的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在本機系統。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能設定為`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>裝載於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property value is changed to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>屬性設定為`true`不會執行完全信任的應用程式中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>屬性值變更為`false`。

trans-unit.source: An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器裝載應用程式是不會在完全信任中執行的應用程式的範例。

trans-unit.target: [相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 內容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model**: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A> property is the only content property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型**:<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>屬性是只包含內容屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only have one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>只能有一個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>為子系，但子系可以包含複雜的內嵌的內容。

trans-unit.source: For example, the child can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, text, and other types of controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以是子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>、 文字和其他類型的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When content is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 當將內容新增至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>就會在控制項邏輯父代的內容。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容會被視為邏輯的子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，在不同的視窗具有自己的視覺呈現子內容樹狀結構時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 屬性變更為 <see langword="false" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is opened and closed by toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>開啟和關閉切換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Closed>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> to which to add child content.
trans-unit.target: 要加入子內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> child content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 子內容。

trans-unit.source: Attaches a child element to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將子項目附加至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想要建立自訂控制項，其中擁有與現有的控制項相同的功能，而且也表現的行為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: You can make your control behave like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> by adding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to your control and calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讓控制項的行為與相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>設您的控制項，並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將指派`child`子屬性並將下列屬性的繫結`child`。

trans-unit.source: You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該實作這些相依性屬性，所以您可能會在控制項中的使用的相同方式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂相依性屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A>, `child` cannot be a child of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A>，`child`不可為的子系<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`PlacementTarget`之前呼叫這個方法應該設在您的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a delegate handler method that positions the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定放置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的委派處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> delegate method that provides placement information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> 委派方法，提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的位置資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A>委派。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical parent of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 的邏輯父項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> does not have a defined parent and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> is not <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 沒有任何已定義的父項目，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，則會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the return values are the same as <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetUIParentCore" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，傳回值與 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetUIParentCore" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is displayed with a drop shadow effect.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否使用下拉式陰影效果顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is displayed with a drop shadow; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用下拉式陰影顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A drop shadow effect displays when the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 時，會顯示下拉式陰影效果<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性都設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標原點與快顯功能表對齊點之間的水平距離。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目標原點與快顯畫面 (Popup) 對齊點之間的水平距離。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 目標原點，並且快顯對齊點的相關資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定放置在快顯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串沒有明確包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>範圍限制與本主題中的屬性值 > 一節所述。

trans-unit.source: A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A`double`值如前面所述此資料表中，後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`，或`pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in=96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 為英吋。1 中 = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> properties to 20.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>到 20 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom>（此為預設值），讓目標原點是目標區域的左下的角，快顯對齊點的左上的角<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 是否可見。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 為可見，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a control uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> as part of its default style, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to a property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一部分的預設樣式，將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> can bind its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>可以繫結其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: This simplifies the logic for controlling when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這可簡化邏輯來控制何時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>為可見。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that you can use to access the logical child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得列舉值，您可以使用這個列舉值來存取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的邏輯子項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that you can use to access the logical child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以用來存取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 控制項之邏輯子項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When you add content to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 當您將內容加入到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>就會在控制項邏輯父代的內容。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>內容會被視為邏輯的子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，在不同的視窗有它自己的 visual 轉譯子內容樹狀結構時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The available size that this element can give to the child.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目可以提供給子項目使用的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can use infinity as a value to indicate that the element can size to whatever content is available.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將值指定為無限，以表示項目大小可以調整至內容使用的任何大小。

trans-unit.source: Determines the required size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> content within the visual tree of the logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 決定邏輯父項目的視覺化樹狀結構內 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 內容的必要大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> properties both equal to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 結構，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 屬性都等於零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns a <xref:System.Windows.Size> that has a width and height of zero (0), because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is not located in the visual tree of its logical parent or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Size>，其具有寬度和高度的零 (0)，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>找不到邏輯父代的視覺化樹狀結構的內容或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The child content is created in a different window that has its own visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 子內容會建立在不同的視窗有它自己的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes from to <see langword="true" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 屬性的值從 <see langword="true" /> 變更為 <see langword="false" /> 時回應。

trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 屬性的值從 <see langword="false" /> 變更為 <see langword="true" /> 的條件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is opened and closed by toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>開啟和關閉切換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Opened> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Opened>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when it overlaps screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項開啟時的方向，以及指定當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項與畫面邊界重疊時的行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> enumeration value that determines the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> 列舉值，決定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項開啟時的方向，以及指定控制項與畫面互動時的行為。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom" />。

trans-unit.source: You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定放置在快顯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment%2A> property is `true`, setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> reverses the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>; a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> aligns its left edge with the right edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> aligns its right edge with the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment%2A>屬性是`true`，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right>反轉的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>;<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left>對齊與與其左邊的緣邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right>對齊左邊緣與其右邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> are 50, 50, 50, and 100, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>分別為 50，50，50，100。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is relative to the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>相對於範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> property does not create a visible element in the application; the example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> with the same bounds to represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>屬性不會看到的項目建立應用程式中，此範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>以相同的界限來代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> that is the child of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> to `ellipse1`, so the popup is relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>也就是子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>至`ellipse1`，因此快顯視窗是相對於<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an animation for the opening and closing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定動畫，這個動畫會用來開啟與關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation" /> enumeration value that defines an animation to open and close a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation" /> 列舉值，定義開啟與關閉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項的動畫。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation.None" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only animate when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>才可以動畫顯示時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This requires the application that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control to run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這需要建立的應用程式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項以完全信任執行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> is animated, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> will not be animated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>動畫效果，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>不具有動畫效果。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when the control is no longer in focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項失去焦點時是否關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時關閉，則為 <see langword="false" />。如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項在滑鼠或鍵盤事件於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控制項外發生時關閉，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A>屬性設定為`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>保持開啟，直到它已明確關閉藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制會攔截所有的滑鼠和鍵盤事件以判斷其中一個事件發生外部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目標原點與快顯功能表 (Popup) 對齊點之間的垂直距離。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串沒有明確包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>範圍限制與本主題中的屬性值 > 一節所述。

trans-unit.source: A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A`double`值如前面所述此資料表中，後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`，或`pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in=96px
trans-unit.target: `in` 為英吋。1 中 = 96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> properties to 20.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A>到 20 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area, and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom>（此為預設值），因此目標原點是左下的角的 [目標] 區域中，同時快顯對齊點的左上的角<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。
